_comment: EMI tag translations and item tooltips for Create: Prepare to Dye 2
tag.item.ptd.variant.create_waxed_expose: Create Waxed Exposed Copper Shingle Variants
Create Waxed Exposed Copper Tile Variants
tag.item.ptd.variant.create_waxed_weathe: Create Waxed Weathered Copper Shingle Variants
Create Waxed Weathered Copper Tile Variants
tag.item.ptd.variant.create_waxed_oxidiz: Create Waxed Oxidized Copper Shingle Variants
Create Waxed Oxidized Copper Tile Variants
_comment_tooltips: Item tooltips - use underscores for emphasis (rendered as gold)
ptd.tooltip.ae2.toggle_bus: A _network cable_ that allows its connection state to be _toggled_ via _redstone._ This allows you to cut off a section of a ME Network. When _redstone signal_ supplied the part enables the connection, _ME Inverted Toggle Bus_ provides the reverse behavior by disabling the connection instead.
ptd.tooltip.ae2.storage_bus: The _ME Storage Bus_, when attached to another inventory block in the world lets you _access_ that inventory _via networked functions_. This allows you to use chests, barrels, or other types of item storage in your networks. The storage via the _ME Storage Bus_ is bi-directional, it can both insert, or extract items from the inventory block it is attached to as long as the _ME Storage Bus_ has its _required channel._
ptd.tooltip.ae2.terminal: The _Storage Terminal_ is a HID which gives you _access_ to items stored in your _ME Network_. This will also include items accessible through _ME Storage Bus_. It has the ability to _sort_ and _search_, as well as _filter_ by using _View Cell_. It requires a _channel_ to function. Can be upgraded into a _ME Crafting Terminal_.
ptd.tooltip.ae2.smart_cable: A Network _requires power_, provided by _milk cells_. The maximum amount of devices in one network is _8_. A cable will show the amount of _channels_ used on connected devices
ptd.tooltip.ae2.energy_cell: A _milk cell_, which can be filled with _milk_ using a _spout_ when placed in the world, is the only way to supply a _network_ with _power_.
ptd.tooltip.ae2.budding_quartz: Quartz grows on _budding quartz_ naturally, when the budding quartz is depleted it can be recharged using _Polished Rose Quartz_. The quartz buds and clusters that grow on the budding quartz can be broken gently (not with a drill! They are fragile!) to obtain quartz
ptd.tooltip.minecraft.water_bucket: Water is the essence of most organic life, useful for many things, and is not infinite
ptd.tooltip.minecraft.white_concrete_pow: Flowing milk can be purified with _pure daisy_ to make _white powder_
ptd.tooltip.minecraft.lava_bucket: Found abundantly underground, can be purified into _orange powder_
ptd.tooltip.create.scoria: Can be made by searing flowing _chocolate_ with _lava_
ptd.tooltip.minecraft.cobblestone: Can be made by searing flowing _water_ with _lava_
ptd.tooltip.create.limestone: Can be made by searing flowing _honey_ with _lava_
ptd.tooltip.minecraft.milk_bucket: Ever since the invention of modern _engines_, _milk_ has been the building block of civilizations, _rocket fuel for the masses._ Easy to produce, easy to consume, and tasty too! To acquire _milk_ you will need to find a _cow_ and interact with it using a _bucket_, either by hand or using a _deployer_. The modern _cow_ can produce milk every _20 seconds_
ptd.tooltip.minecraft.cauldron: Can be filled with _water_ or _lava_ by hand or using a _spout_, used in the process of making _salt_ among other things
ptd.tooltip.createdieselgenerators.diese: The _Engine_, a modern invention, can run on various fuels, from _milk_, widely used for space travel, to _bio-diesel_, known for its greater efficiency. The _engine_ has a specialized manual insertion hatch, so in addition to _pumps_, _buckets_ can also top up this device. The _engine_ will output power to the _shaft_ it is connected to. The _engine_ can also be Turbocharged using an _Engine Turbocharger_
ptd.tooltip.wares.delivery_agreement: An intergalactic agreement, bound by the United SPACE consumer union plus plus treaty. When completed can (usually) be mixed in a _Mechanical Mixer_ to acquire more contracts. Note: some trades can be repeated multiple times before the contract is completed!
ptd.tooltip.wares.completed_delivery_agr: A completed intergalactic agreement, check it's uses (U by default) with your index module (EMI) to see what new trades await you in the mesh. Bound by the United SPACE consumer union plus plus treaty. Can (usually) be mixed in a _Mechanical Mixer_ to acquire more contracts. Or hanged on the wall
ptd.tooltip.create.blaze_burner: A _blaze burner_, a device that can be used to power _mana pool_, Heating and Super-Heating _Basins_, _boilers_ and _distillation towers_ and can also be used as pretty lighting emitter. To acquire _blaze burner_ you will need to find a _blaze_ and catch it, unfortunately _blaze_ are not native to this planet, so _importing them from space may be needed_. Experts also say that it is possible to fabricate a _fel blaze_ with a _fel pumpkin_ and that it can work as a blaze alternative
ptd.tooltip.supplementaries.ash: Ash is created when things burn down
ptd.tooltip.crafting_on_a_stick.stonecut: A _Personal Assembler_ is a powerful device that can convert devices between to other devices of the same type. This specific one is also built into your Automaton model so you can press _V_ to open it, and throw this item away!
ptd.tooltip.minecraft.bone_meal: An important accelerant for life, some say it was the only resource this planet was good for, because of all the _bones_ found on this while soil, _White Powder_ rather.
ptd.tooltip.createdieselgenerators.disti: The _Distillery Controller_ allows you to assemble a _Distillery_. Right click on the _tank structure_ you want to transform into a distillery, a controller will be used for each tank attached. Note that you need _one tank per output in addition to the one on the bottom_ that takes the input
ptd.tooltip.minecraft.egg: Feed a _seed_ to a _chicken_ to get an _egg_
ptd.tooltip.golden_tools: Yellow tools are always outfitted with _Fortune_, widely used in production lines and slave mines
ptd.tooltip.diamond_tools: Light Blue tools are always outfitted with _Silk Touch_, used for collection of delicate minerals and in limb relocation surgeries
ptd.tooltip.wood_logs: Such a basic element, a building block for many things. This planet however does not seem too friendly to trees, none can grow here. _Expect to pay highly to get yours_. It is also said that there are advanced methods that use _chorus fruit_ or _livingwood sticks_ that can also result in useable logs
ptd.tooltip.dyeing.redstone: Can be made by dyeing _stone_ with _red dye_
ptd.tooltip.dyeing.iron_ore: Can be made by dyeing _stone_ with _white dye_
ptd.tooltip.dyeing.iron_ingot: Can be made by dyeing _white powder_ or _stone_ with _white dye_
ptd.tooltip.dyeing.copper_ore: Can be made by dyeing _stone_ with _orange dye_
ptd.tooltip.dyeing.copper_ingot: Can be made by dyeing _orange powder_ or _stone_ with _orange dye_
ptd.tooltip.dyeing.deepslate_diamond_ore: Can be made by dyeing _deepslate_ with _light blue dye_
ptd.tooltip.dyeing.deepslate_emerald_ore: Can be made by dyeing _deepslate_ with _lime dye_
ptd.tooltip.dyeing.deepslate_lapis_ore: Can be made by dyeing _deepslate_ with _blue dye_
ptd.tooltip.dyeing.deepslate_coal_ore: Can be made by dyeing _deepslate_ with _black dye_
ptd.tooltip.dyeing.deepslate_iron_ore: Can be made by dyeing _deepslate_ with _white dye_
ptd.tooltip.dyeing.deepslate_copper_ore: Can be made by dyeing _deepslate_ with _orange dye_
ptd.tooltip.dyeing.deepslate_gold_ore: Can be made by dyeing _deepslate_ with _yellow dye_
ptd.tooltip.dyeing.deepslate_redstone_or: Can be made by dyeing _deepslate_ with _red dye_
ptd.tooltip.ptdye.trading_transceiver: A single-use transceiver used to request an _Oscar-Delta_ class Trading Platform for all your inter-union trading needs. _Right click_ to request a trading platform near your current location. Expect a delivery time of up to 2-3 business days. Terms and conditions may apply. Note: The trading platform _cannot be moved_ after it lands. Unless using the _Intergalactic Postage Stamp Transceiver_ to return the platform to the company.
ptd.tooltip.ptdye.postage_stamp_transcei: A single-use transceiver used to return your _Oscar-Delta_ class Trading Platform to the _United SPACE consumer union plus plus_ company. _Right click_ to return your trading platform to the company. Gives you back an _Trading Platform request transceiver_
ptd.tooltip.ptdye.mechanical_device: A _Mechanical Device_ can be converted through the _Personal Assembler [V] to open_ to many different devices with a mechanical nature like the _Gearbox_, the _Mechanical Mixer_, the _Deployer_ and many more! Any device of that type can be converted back to a _Mechanical Device_ in the inventory crafting grid
ptd.tooltip.ptdye.sturdy_device: A _Sturdy Device_ can be converted through the _Personal Assembler [V] to open_ to many different devices with that are metal, stony and sturdy in nature like the _Hopper_, the _Piston_, the _Basin_ and many more! Any device of that type can be converted back to a _Sturdy Device_ in the inventory crafting grid
ptd.tooltip.ptdye.smart_device: A _Smart Device_ can be converted through the _Personal Assembler [V] to open_ to many different devices with smart, intricate functionality like the _smart funnel_, the _engine_, the _Rotation Speed Controller_ and many more! Any device of that type can be converted back to a _Smart Device_ in the inventory crafting grid
ptd.tooltip.ptdye.sealed_device: A _Sealed Device_ can be converted through the _Personal Assembler [V] to open_ to many different devices with that are adapted to fluid transfer and manipulation like the _Fluid Pipe_ and the _Fluid Pump_, the _Fluid Tank_ and _Item Drain_ and many more! Any device of that type can be converted back to a _Sealed Device_ in the inventory crafting grid
ptd.tooltip.ptdye.logic_device: A _Logic Device_ can be converted through the _Personal Assembler [V] to open_ to many different redstone and logic devices like the _Comparator_, the _Repeater_, the _Redstone Link_ and many more! Any device of that type can be converted back to a _Logic Device_ in the inventory crafting grid
ptd.tooltip.ptdye.locomotive_device: A _Locomotive Device_ can be converted through the _Personal Assembler [V] to open_ to many different train and railway devices like the _Track Station_, the _Train Controls_, the _Signals_ and many more! Any device of that type can be converted back to a _Locomotive Device_ in the inventory crafting grid
ptd.tooltip.ptdye.red_stringed_device: A _Red Stringed Device_ can be converted through the _Personal Assembler [V] to open_ to many different Botania red string devices! Any device of that type can be converted back to a _Red Stringed Device_ in the inventory crafting grid
ptd.tooltip.ptdye.furnished_device: A _Furnished Device_ can be converted through the _Personal Assembler [V] to open_ to many different wooden and furniture devices like _Doors_, _Signs_, _Beds_ and many more! Any device of that type can be converted back to a _Furnished Device_ in the inventory crafting grid
ptd.tooltip.disabled_item: This item was removed from the game. If you acquired it in Automation mode, please contact the Create: Prepare to Dye developers on Discord or Github
